content: I struggled to survive in the mortal world since I came to life and joined this world. I lived my own life according to my own feelings, and even if the waves toss me up and down, sending me to the border of death, I will never grieve, lament, fear, or worry; I will savor these flavors thoroughly, and will still laugh crazily until the end.
author: Gu Zhen Ren
